verses.verse: A Psalm of David, <WH1732> when he changed <WH8138> <WH853> his behavior <WH2940> before <WH6440> Abimelech; <WH40> who drove him away, <WH1644> and he departed. <WH1980> I will bless <WH1288> the <WH853> LORD <WH3068> at all <WH3605> times: <WH6256> his praise <WH8416> shall continually <WH8548> be in my mouth. <WH6310>
My soul <WH5315> shall make her boast <WH1984> in the LORD: <WH3068> the humble <WH6035> shall hear <WH8085> thereof, and be glad. <WH8055>
O magnify <WH1431> the LORD <WH3068> with <WH854> me, and let us exalt <WH7311> his name <WH8034> together. <WH3162>
I sought <WH1875> <WH853> the LORD, <WH3068> and he heard <WH6030> me, and delivered <WH5337> me from all <WH4480> <WH3605> my fears. <WH4035>
They looked <WH5027> unto <WH413> him, and were lightened: <WH5102> and their faces <WH6440> were not <WH408> ashamed. <WH2659>
This <WH2088> poor <WH6041> man cried, <WH7121> and the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH8085> him, and saved <WH3467> him out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> his troubles. <WH6869>
The angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> encampeth <WH2583> round about <WH5439> them that fear <WH3373> him, and delivereth <WH2502> them.
O taste <WH2938> and see <WH7200> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> is good: <WH2896> blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that trusteth <WH2620> in him.
O fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD, <WH3068> ye his saints: <WH6918> for <WH3588> there is no <WH369> want <WH4270> to them that fear <WH3373> him.
The young lions <WH3715> do lack, <WH7326> and suffer hunger: <WH7456> but they that seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068> shall not <WH3808> want <WH2637> any <WH3605> good <WH2896> thing.
Come, <WH1980> ye children, <WH1121> hearken <WH8085> unto me: I will teach <WH3925> you the fear <WH3374> of the LORD. <WH3068>
What <WH4310> man <WH376> is he that desireth <WH2655> life, <WH2416> and loveth <WH157> many days, <WH3117> that he may see <WH7200> good? <WH2896>
Keep <WH5341> thy tongue <WH3956> from evil, <WH4480> <WH7451> and thy lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH4480> <WH1696> guile. <WH4820>
Depart <WH5493> from evil, <WH4480> <WH7451> and do <WH6213> good; <WH2896> seek <WH1245> peace, <WH7965> and pursue <WH7291> it.
The eyes <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> are upon <WH413> the righteous, <WH6662> and his ears <WH241> are open unto <WH413> their cry. <WH7775>
The face <WH6440> of the LORD <WH3068> is against them that do <WH6213> evil, <WH7451> to cut off <WH3772> the remembrance <WH2143> of them from the earth. <WH4480> <WH776>
The righteous cry, <WH6817> and the LORD <WH3068> heareth, <WH8085> and delivereth <WH5337> them out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> their troubles. <WH6869>
The LORD <WH3068> is nigh <WH7138> unto them that are of a broken <WH7665> heart; <WH3820> and saveth <WH3467> such as be of a contrite <WH1793> spirit. <WH7307>
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous: <WH6662> but the LORD <WH3068> delivereth <WH5337> him out of them all. <WH4480> <WH3605>
He keepeth <WH8104> all <WH3605> his bones: <WH6106> not <WH3808> one <WH259> of them <WH4480> <WH2007> is broken. <WH7665>
Evil <WH7451> shall slay <WH4191> the wicked: <WH7563> and they that hate <WH8130> the righteous <WH6662> shall be desolate. <WH816>
The LORD <WH3068> redeemeth <WH6299> the soul <WH5315> of his servants: <WH5650> and none <WH3808> <WH3605> of them that trust <WH2620> in him shall be desolate. <WH816>
